title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Peacock Vaddanam - CoBelt00001
materials: 5.11 carats of Square Emeralds (2 stones). Crafted with meticulous Hyderabadi polish.
features: This Vaddanam showcases a captivating peacock (Mayura) design, intricately crafted with diamond-studded feathers and ruby eyes. Features alternating floral motifs and two prominent Emeralds for the center and the lower pendant. The flexible design ensures a comfortable fit.
colors: Primarily gold and sparkling white from the diamonds
accentuated by the vibrant red of the rubies and the rich green of the emeralds. A classic and auspicious color palette for South Indian weddings.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (Muhurtham)
or any grand festive occasion. Also suitable for upscale modern events when a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This Vaddanam represents timeless South Indian elegance. The Mayura design symbolizes beauty and prosperity, making it an auspicious addition to any bridal trousseau. The combination of diamonds, rubies, and emeralds ensures unmatched sparkle and enduring value. Handcrafted with precision by skilled artisans from Hyderabad.
